instruction: Please review the 2022 MSCI ACWI Climate Indexes and compare them to the MSCI ACWI Index. Assess their success in meeting respective climate objectives with a focus on decarbonization. Report on any discrepancies in carbon footprint between the two indexes.
output: After reviewing the 2022 MSCI ACWI Climate Indexes and comparing them to the MSCI ACWI Index, it has been noted that the former index showed a significantly lower carbon footprint compared to the latter. Additionally, the climate indexes have also demonstrated success in meeting respective climate objectives, particularly in terms of decarbonization relative to the broad market-cap allocations. This analysis emphasizes the importance of considering risk-adjusted return characteristics and climate objectives when making allocations as institutional investors with fiduciary responsibilities.
